ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: cycle view on mobile phone not readable because of cycle lane
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior When I go to the cycle view on the mobile version the information view of the cycle cannot be hidden. Therefore the issues are not visible. ### Steps to reproduce On desktop version: 1 go to a board 2 click on cycles 3 create cycle 4 add some issues to the cycle Then on mobile version: 1 go to board 2 go to cycles 3 click on the cycle you created 4 now you See a big area with sprint info which cannot be hidden. ### Browser Other ### Version Cloud
